meta_description: JobContax is a technical recruitment agency which specialises in Engineering Jobs and Design Jobs. Visit JobContax website to Apply.
paragraph: JobContax is a specialist recruiter within the Engineering and Design sectors and has operations on all 5 continents.
paragraph2: JobContax recruits for leading EPCm's, engineering companies, contractors, developers and consulting engineers in Ireland, UK, Europe, UAE, Qatar, Saudi Arabia, Egypt, Canada, Australia, China and India.
paragraph3: Clients include Amec, BHP Billiton, Carillion, Emaar, Habtoor Leighton, Intel, Jacobs Engineering, Shell and many more.
paragraph4: If none of our current jobs match your experience, email your CV/Resume to cv@jobcontax.com, and we will contact you when relevalant jobs open.

paragraph:
JobContax is a specialist recruiter within the Construction and Infrastructure sectors and has operations on all 5 continents.
JobContax recruits for leading EPCm's, engineering companies, contractors, developers and consulting engineers in Ireland, UK, Europe, UAE, Qatar, Saudi Arabia, Egypt, Canada, Australia, China and India.
Clients include Amec, BHP Billiton, Carillion, Emaar, Habtoor Leighton, Intel, Jacobs Engineering, Shell and many more.
If none of our current jobs match your experience, email your CV/Resume to cv@jobcontax.com, and we will contact you when relevalant jobs open.

page_title: Biotech Jobs | Pharma Jobs | Medical Device Jobs - JobContax

meta_keywords: Life Science Jobs, Biotechnology Jobs, Pharmaceutical Jobs, Medical Device Jobs, Biotech Jobs, Pharma Jobs, Med Dev Jobs
paragraph:
JobContax is a specialist recruiter within the Life Science, Biotechnology, Pharmaceutical, Medical Device sectors and has operations on all 5 continents.
JobContax recruits for leading global multinationals, EPCm consultancies and startups, in Ireland, UK, Europe, Canada, Australia, China and India.
Clients include: Amgen, Genzyme, GSK, Intel, Jacobs Engineering, J&J, Novartis, Pfizer and many more.
If none of our current jobs match your experience, email your CV/Resume to cv@jobcontax.com, and we will contact you when relevalant jobs open.
